comments.body: Is there a way to NOT copy the file?  This is just going to drift again.  We usually grep for things, but sometimes things get missed or forgotten.

@thockin We are working toward a solution that would copy the *.base files. The current code renders templates at deploy time and we insert the architecture that the master is running on. So our template needs an architecture variable. I asked you about this on slack and we would have to address all calling cases which is a much larger pull request that is outside the scope of getting current with kubedns. 

Is this change OK to review?
I created  #30017 to track the architecture issue, please leave comments there.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +20,24 @@kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: kube-dns-v18
  namespace: kube-system
  labels:
